title: Fizz deals 8% of your max health per hit, it's like perma Sion passive
body:
With bork dealing 8% current physical and his W doing 8% missing magic it's a consistent 8% max health half being magic the other half being physical


That's assuming I've got this math shit down 

Combined w/ devourer it's more like 11% of your health

Hey but Lee Sin is literally game breaking amirite?
